revised_title: Observations on the Case of Mr. Le Grange and the Role of Bile in the Animal Oeconomy
tldr: The author examines the case of Mr. Le Grange, whose gallbladder was distended due to a partial obstruction in the biliary system. The author explains the mechanical and necessary connection between the symptoms and their effects, and how the obstruction led to the distention of the abdomen. The case highlights the importance of bile in the animal economy and its role in digestion and overall health.
